item.title: 玻利维亚获45亿美元美洲开发银行贷款支持紧急改革
item.description: 玻利维亚获得45亿美元多边贷款，这为新政府稳定经济提供了助力，该国经济正经历自1980年代以来最严重的危机。【原文：Bolivia secured a further $4.5 billion in multilateral lending, boosting the new government’s chances of stabilizing an economy enduring its deepest crisis since the 1980s.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉逐步释放囚犯期间释放美国公民
item.description: 知情人士称，委内瑞拉政府已开始释放具有美国国籍的囚犯。【原文：The Venezuela government has started releasing prisoners with US citizenship, people with knowledge of the situation said.】

item.title: 特朗普信用卡限额政策将冲击700亿美元债务市场
item.description: 分析师指出，拟议中的信用卡利率上限将重创规模达700亿美元的债务债券化市场，尽管投资者对政策能否真正实施持不以为然的态度。【原文：A proposed ceiling on credit card interest rates would deal a heavy blow to the $70 billion market that bundles the debt into bonds, according to analysts, even as investors shrug off the likelihood any actual policy comes to pass.】

item.title: 美国通过新规为英伟达向中国销售H200芯片扫清障碍
item.description: 特朗普政府通过修订向中国买家出口处理器的审批标准，使英伟达公司向中国销售其H200人工智能芯片的计划更近一步。【原文：The Trump administration moved closer to allowing Nvidia Corp. to sell its H200 artificial intelligence chips to China by issuing revised criteria for winning US government approval to ship the processors to Chinese buyers.】

item.title: 亚洲股市料谨慎开盘，标普500指数下跌：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市有望普遍高开，尽管美国股指因通胀数据未能改变市场对美联储暂停降息的预期而走低。【原文：Stocks in Asia are set for a mostly positive start even after US gauges slipped on inflation data that failed to alter bets on a pause in Federal Reserve rate cuts.】

item.title: 黑石集团支持的移动广告公司Liftoff申请在美国上市
item.description: Liftoff Mobile公司已提交美国首次公开募股申请。该公司致力于在移动应用程序中投放广告，并协助发布商管理其广告库存。【原文：Liftoff Mobile Inc., a company that helps place ads within mobile applications and lets publishers manage their inventory, filed for a US initial public offering.】

item.title: 越来越多的期权交易者认为美联储2026年不会降息
item.description: 专注于期权交易的投资者正日益将美联储2026年降息的预期从定价中剔除，转而押注央行若全年维持利率不变将获得回报。【原文：Traders focused on options are increasingly pricing out expectations for any Federal Reserve interest rate cuts in 2026, making wagers instead that would pay off if the central bank stays on hold all year.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称基差交易规模已膨胀至1.5万亿美元
item.description: 摩根士丹利策略师指出，基础交易规模已膨胀至约1.5万亿美元，这凸显出密切监控其规模的重要性，以避免重演2020年市场剧烈波动的局面。【原文：The basis trade has swelled to roughly $1.5 trillion, underscoring the need to closely monitor its size to avoid a repeat of the market eruption seen in 2020, according to Morgan Stanley strategists.】

item.title: 三色公司创始人、前首席运营官对欺诈指控不认罪
item.description: 三色控股公司创始人朱丹尼尔与前首席运营官大卫·古德盖姆对指控表示不认罪，他们被控合谋欺诈这家破产次级汽车贷款机构的贷款方和投资者。【原文：Tricolor Holdings founder Daniel Chu and former Chief Operating Officer David Goodgame pleaded not guilty to charges that they conspired to defraud lenders and investors in the bankrupt subprime auto lender.】

item.title: 阿波罗计划为马斯克旗下xAI公司私有芯片贷款开启交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，阿波罗全球管理公司正试图启动一项私募债务交易，以支持埃隆·马斯克的人工智能初创公司xAI Corp.。【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. is trying to open up trading on a private debt deal supporting Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup xAI Corp., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 城堡资本及其他精神债券持有人将决定航空公司能否渡过破产危机
item.description: 肯·格里芬的城堡资本及其他Spirit航空债券持有人，很可能将决定这家廉价航空公司能否在破产中存续或最终停业——该公司飞行员所属的工会周二表示。【原文：Ken Griffin’s Citadel and other Spirit Aviation bondholders will likely dictate whether the budget airline survives bankruptcy or shuts down, a labor union representing its pilots said Tuesday.】

item.title: 特朗普可能损害中国、印度乃至美国消费者利益以打压伊朗
item.description:
今日《亚洲大视野》播客焦点：特朗普对伊朗的关税威胁会否重燃与中印的贸易战？

【原文：

On today’s Big Take Asia podcast: Could Trump’s Iran tariff threat reignite a trade war with China and India?

】

item.title: 人工智能芯片初创企业Etched完成5亿美元融资，将与英伟达展开竞争
item.description: 据知情人士透露，人工智能芯片初创企业Etched在最新融资轮中筹集了约5亿美元资金，此举旨在与英伟达公司在蓬勃发展的人工智能处理器市场展开竞争。【原文：AI chip startup Etched raised about $500 million in a new funding round, according to people familiar with the matter, part of an effort to compete with Nvidia Corp. in the booming market for artificial intelligence processors.】

item.title: 战神资本在信贷二级市场持续繁荣中筹集71亿美元
item.description: Ares Management Corp.为其首只私募信贷二级市场策略募集了71亿美元资金，并预计今年信贷二级市场份额交易量将持续快速增长。【原文：Ares Management Corp. collected $7.1 billion for its debut private credit secondaries strategy and expects the market for secondhand credit stakes to continue its rapid growth this year.】

item.title: 艾瑞尔·罗杰斯预测2026年经济衰退，道指或暴跌20%
item.description: 据阿里尔投资公司董事长兼联席首席执行官约翰·罗杰斯预测，随着中等收入消费者难以承受高昂的生活成本，美国经济可能在年底陷入小幅衰退，股市也将随之下跌。【原文：The US will likely slide into a small recession at the end of the year and the stock market will drop as average-income consumers struggle with high living costs, according to John Rogers, chairman and co-chief executive officer of Ariel Investments.】

item.title: 得益于关税大幅上调，2025年美国财政赤字缩减至1.7万亿美元
item.description: 美国2025财年预算赤字降至1.67万亿美元，创三年来最低水平，这主要得益于海关收入创纪录的激增。【原文：The US budget deficit shrank to $1.67 trillion for the 2025 calendar year, the smallest in three years, thanks mainly to a record surge in customs revenue.】

item.title: 鲍威尔向国会议员作证成为司法部高风险调查焦点
item.description: 杰罗姆·鲍威尔态度明确：不允许建造蜂巢式建筑或梯田式屋顶花园。不允许增设喷泉或豪华大理石装饰。不允许设置专用电梯或贵宾餐厅。【原文：Jerome Powell was clear: No beehives or terraced roof gardens. No new fountains or fancy marble. No special elevators or VIP dining rooms.】

item.title: 智利铜业在改革后瞄准两位数增长
item.description: 智利矿业协会表示，作为全球最大的铜生产国，智利在新政府领导下通过削减繁文缛节和放松监管，有望打破长达二十年的产量停滞局面。【原文：Chile, the world’s top copper producer, could break out of two decades of stagnant output by cutting red tape and easing regulation under the incoming government, according to the country’s mining industry group.】

item.title: 马斯克在伊朗提供免费星链服务，因该国持续遭遇互联网中断
item.description: 在伊朗爆发致命抗议活动并遭遇数日互联网中断之际，埃隆·马斯克的SpaceX公司现正为该国提供免费的Starlink卫星服务。【原文：Elon Musk’s SpaceX is now offering free Starlink satellite service in Iran amid deadly protests and a days-long internet blackout.】

item.title: 阿根廷12月通胀率加速升幅超预期
item.description: 阿根廷通胀率在12月连续第四个月加速攀升，涨幅超出预期，这将成为总统哈维尔·米莱为吸引外国直接投资必须应对的挑战。【原文：Inflation in Argentina accelerated more than expected and for a fourth straight month in December, a challenge President Javier Milei will have to tackle to incentivize foreign direct investment.】

item.title: 特朗普称其促成的北美贸易协定“无关紧要”
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普对与加拿大和墨西哥达成的北美贸易协定表现出漠不关心的态度，预示着美国最大自由贸易协定的重新谈判将旷日持久。【原文：President Donald Trump expressed indifference toward the North American trade agreement with Canada and Mexico, portending a lengthy renegotiation of the US’s largest free-trade pact.】

item.title: 法国央行对第四季度经济增长持略为乐观态度
item.description: 法国央行小幅上调了2025年第四季度的经济增长预期，凸显出经济在政治和财政不确定性面前展现出的韧性。【原文：The Bank of France raised its growth estimate for the final quarter of 2025 a touch, underscoring economy’s resilience in the face of political and fiscal uncertainty.】

item.title: 机器人交易员加码看涨原油押注，特朗普伊朗言论冲击油价
item.description: 算法交易员对原油转为看涨，这是自9月以来首次出现这种情况，因美国总统唐纳德·特朗普加剧了对伊朗政府的言论攻势。【原文：Algorithmic traders have turned bullish on crude oil for the first time since September as US President Donald Trump intensifies his rhetoric against the Iranian government.】

item.title: 据称Asta Energy正考虑本周启动法兰克福IPO
item.description: 知情人士透露，电力设备和电动汽车用铜基部件制造商Asta Energy Solutions AG正考虑最早于本周在法兰克福启动首次公开募股。【原文：Asta Energy Solutions AG, a manufacturer of copper-based components used in power plants and electric vehicles, is considering launching an initial public offering in Frankfurt as soon as this week, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 哈德逊河2025年贸易收入预计将创下123亿美元的纪录
item.description: 做市商公司哈德逊河交易公司的交易收入在2025年攀升至创纪录水平，波动的市场助推了全球范围内这些撮合买卖双方的公司业绩。【原文：Trading revenue at market-making firm Hudson River Trading rose in 2025 toward a record level as volatile markets helped lift results globally for companies that step in to match buyers and sellers.】

item.title: 沃伯格考虑以10亿美元出售伦敦保险经纪公司麦吉尔
item.description: 据知情人士透露，华平投资正考虑出售英国保险经纪公司McGill and Partners。【原文：Warburg Pincus is considering a possible sale of UK insurance broker McGill and Partners, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Bitpanda据悉正筹备于2026年上半年在法兰克福上市
item.description: 知情人士透露，由亿万富翁彼得·蒂尔支持的加密货币交易平台Bitpanda GmbH正筹备于今年上半年在法兰克福证券交易所首次公开募股。【原文：Bitpanda GmbH, a cryptocurrency trading platform backed by billionaire Peter Thiel, is gearing up for a Frankfurt initial public offering as soon as the first half of this year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 市政债券开年表现强劲，"一月效应"显现
item.description: 市政债券以强劲态势开启2026年，所谓"一月效应"推高价格，再投资资金正大量涌入市场。【原文：Municipal bonds are starting 2026 on strong footing, with the so-called “January effect” lifting prices as reinvestment cash floods the market.】

item.title: 摩根大通、花旗正商讨为阿根廷10亿美元输油管道项目提供融资
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，包括摩根大通公司和花旗集团在内的一批银行正商讨向阿根廷天然气生产商提供约10亿美元贷款，用于建设一条横贯全国的天然气管道。【原文：A group of banks including JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Citigroup Inc. are in talks to lend natural gas producers in Argentina roughly $1 billion to build a cross-country pipeline, according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 穆巴达拉支持的CI收购景顺加拿大基金资产
item.description: 总部位于亚特兰大的景顺有限公司正将其价值260亿加元（约合187亿美元）的加拿大投资基金业务出售给CI全球资产管理公司，此举进一步推动了该国共同基金行业的并购趋势。【原文：Atlanta-based Invesco Ltd. is selling its C$26 billion ($18.7 billion) Canadian investment fund business to CI Global Asset Management, furthering the M&A trend in the country’s mutual fund industry.】
